longBusinessSummary: ProCredit Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking services for small and medium enterprises and private customers in Europe, South America, and Germany. The company offers business loans for wholesale and retail trade; agriculture; forestry and fishing; production; transportation and storage; construction and real estate; hotel, restaurant, and catering; electricity, gas, steam, and air conditioning supply; and other activities, as well as investment and green loans; and private loans, such as housing, investment, and consumer loans. It also offers current, savings, and term deposit accounts. The company was formerly known as Internationale Micro Investitionen AG and changed its name to ProCredit Holding AG. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
